item.title: LibUltraHDR
item.author: mail@christianmahnke.de (Christian Mahnke)
item.description: After research, it was necessary to explore some possible workflows and to create tools for a project in preparation. Based on Greg Benz’s preliminary work on HDR support, LibUltraHDR was the most sensible candidate for further experimentation.
